title: Zhen Hun Jie 2nd Season: Chongzhi Ban

synonyms: 镇魂街 北落师门篇
Zhen Hun Jie: Bei Luo Shi Men Pian
alternative_titles.ja: 镇魂街 第二季 重制版

synopsis:
Rakshasa Street, where evil spirits are attracted to in order to destroy them. A place where spirits and humans co-exist, not all humans can enter Requiem Street. Only those rare-soul users with guardian spirits can enter. Xia Ling was just a normal university intern, but a meeting by chance changes her ordinary life... In this world full of evil spirits, can you cooperate with your guardian spirit in order to survive? 

(Source: Bilibili)
